# Mini-Design Portfolio

This is a collection of a few projects from my last job where I was a designer and a web developer, as well as some more recent project excerpts.

My web design and development course websites can be found at:

  • DES340
  • DES440

I also encourage you to checkout my CodePen projects, especially my UI explorations:

  • 01: Tabs
  • 02: Modals
  • 03: Animated Navigation Indicator
  • 04: Scroll Progress Indicator
  • 05: Shifting Form Labels
  • 06: Custom Checkboxes and Radio Buttons
  • 07: Stateful Buttons

# Developers

This is a VuePress project, written in Markdown.

Install VuePress by running yarn global add vuepress@next or npm install -g vuepress@next

Then from this project directory, run yarn install or npm install

Run vuepress dev to run locally, vuepress build to build static files for deployment.

VuePress Guide
